thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Friday, 02 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF- Macnica Fuji Electronics Holdings to issue new shares and to distribute shares

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF- Macnica Fuji Electronics Holdings to issue new shares and to distribute shares
text:
March 2(Reuters) - Macnica Fuji Electronics Holdings Inc
* Says it will issue 1.9 million new shares and to distribute 4.2 million shares of its treasury common stock, through public offering
* Says it will issue 2.1 million new shares through private placement, to SMBC Nikko Securities Inc., with subscription date on March 26 and payment date on March 27
* Proceeds to be used for operation fund
Source text in Japanese: goo.gl/tKUwyZ
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
